Settings.title: Trash Updater Settings
Settings.description: Optional settings to control the behavior of Trash Updater

enable_ssl_certificate_validation.title: Allow SSL certificate validation for Sonarr & Radarr
enable_ssl_certificate_validation.description: If set to `false`, SSL certificates are not validated. This is useful if you are connecting to a Sonarr or Radarr instance using `https` and it is set up with self-signed certificates. Note that disabling this setting is a **security risk** and should be avoided unless you are absolutely sure what you are doing.

clone_url.title: Clone URL to the trash guides git repository
clone_url.description: A URL compatible with `git clone` that is used to clone the Trash Guides repository. This setting exists for enthusiasts that may want to instead have Trash Updater pull data from a fork instead of the official repository.
